channel.title: HELP!PLEASE IM SOOO NOOB :'([Picture]
channel.description:
Ok so I got this delta source and well the barrows sucks... not because it delta... but because the npc's hit through the prayer.
If you know how to make the npc not hit through prayer like Npchandler.java or something please tell me how to make it so npcs cant hit you if u have a protection prayer like arhims does mage so how do i make it so he would hit 0's when I use protect mage.
PICTURE(THIS IS THE PROBLEM) [IMG]http://i924.photobucket.com/albums/ad84/Migeant/barrows.jpg[/img]

item.title: HELP!PLEASE IM SOOO NOOB :'([Picture]
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

First of all, if you have no prayer built in, you will need to create a system which allows the user to enable prayers, for example

private boolean prayerProtectMage = false;

After you have done this, the actionButtons will need to adjust these variables accordingly to button presses. Once this is complete, you need to go into the NPCHandler and find the method which deals with MvP. Where it determines the maxHit, you will need to identify which combat style(range,mage,melee) the NPC is using and then use an if statement to determine of the equivalent prayer is on, thereon adjusing the damage accordingly.

Read full topic
